$schema: Crystal index for Lattice. Each entry maps a problem to its crystallized solution file.

$format.problem: Short description of the problem this crystal solves
$format.file: Relative path from crystals/ to the crystal JSON file
$format.tags: Array of keywords for matching (used by hooks)
$format.added: ISO 8601 date when the crystal was created
